Blogpage1.heading1: A Day in the Life at Ekakshar : Waking Up to a Whole New World
Blogpage1.content1: It is critical for our leadership to clearly communicate our purpose, where we are headed, and how we’re going to get there. Our talented professionals deserves the opportunity to measure progress, prioritize resources and feel that sense of accomplishment when the hard work manifests itself into tangible progress.It is critical for our leadership to clearly communicate our purpose, where we are headed, and how we’re going to get there.
